text: Clarence Clyde Seedorf (born 1 April 1976) is a Dutch former football player and current manager. He played for the Netherlands national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season LeagueIncludes Campeonato Carioca 2013.
